## RedemptionDetails.actualZUSDAmount property

Amount of ZUSD that was actually redeemed by the transaction.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
actualZUSDAmount: Decimal;
```

## Remarks

This can end up being lower than `attemptedZUSDAmount` due to interference from another transaction that modifies the list of Troves.
